metadata.synopsis: Dialog with the Flaming Fist Quartermaster, an experienced woman frustrated at the new steel watch unit placed in her armoury.You need to convince her to allow you to trade with her.

26.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
26.text: This is the armoury, not a bloody open house. Fists only. Now clear off.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: I'd like to trade with you.
3.context: NodeContext: 'for now, anyway' has bitter edge to it

5.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
5.text: Trade? Do I look like a shopkeeper?
5.context: NodeContext: 'for now, anyway' has bitter edge to it

4.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
4.text: This equipment isn't for sale. It belongs to the Flaming Fist.
4.context: NodeContext: 'for now, anyway' has bitter edge to it

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Steel Watchers make me uneasy. A good weapon in my palm would put my mind at rest.
1.context: NodeContext: 'Huh' is appraising, she's surprised but ultimately believes you

23.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
23.text: Huh. Wouldn't think anything round here would bother the likes of you. But you're not wrong.
23.context: NodeContext: 'Huh' is appraising, she's surprised but ultimately believes you

9.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
9.text: Strong folk wielding strong blades. That's what keeps folk safe. Not those glorified golems.
9.context: NodeContext: Empassioned, but not too loud, in case anyone hears

8.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
8.text: I don't have anything fancy, but you're welcome to take a look.

32.speaker: Player
32.text: Lord Gortash himself told me to speak with you about my requirements. Were you not informed?
32.context: NodeContext: Pissed off. Narg mragreshem (NARG mrag-RESH-em) = big shithead.

18.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
18.text: 'Course I bloody wasn't. Too busy ordering more of these mechanical monstrosities to tell me.
18.context: NodeContext: Pissed off. Narg mragreshem (NARG mrag-RESH-em) = big shithead.

47.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
47.text: 'Course I bloody wasn't. Too busy ordering more of these mechanical monstrosities to tell me.

22.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
22.text: I suppose you can take a look. But make it quick.

41.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
41.text: Stay sharp, stranger. In these times, all we can trust are the blades in our hands.

77.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
77.text: Stay sharp, stranger. In these times, all we can trust are the blades in our hands.

61.text: No, I wasn't. And if he thinks he can sell off my armoury without telling me... narg mragreshem.
61.context: NodeContext: Pissed off. Narg mragreshem (NARG mrag-RESH-em) = big shithead.

68.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
68.text: No, I wasn't. And if he thinks he can sell off my armoury without telling me... narg mragreshem.
68.context: NodeContext: Pissed off. Narg mragreshem (NARG mrag-RESH-em) = big shithead.

15.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
15.text: You want to spend your gold, find a merchant in the city. My weapons are not for sale!

65.speaker: Player
65.text: Either you trade with me, or I suggest you start running.

52.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
52.text: Fat lot of use that hunk of junk was. Keeping me 'safe', were you? Useless.
52.context: NodeContext: partially to self, re steel watcher in the armoury, 'keeping me safe' is sarcastic.

13.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
13.text: Fat lot of use that hunk of junk was. Keeping me 'safe', were you? Useless.
13.context: NodeContext: partially to self, re steel watcher in the armoury, 'keeping me safe' is sarcastic.

64.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
64.text: Hrm. Guess anyone can saunter in and make threats now that the Watchers are disabled.

17.text: Wake up, you useless hunk of junk, I'm being attacked!
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shouting to the steel watcherNodeContext: Panicked

12.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
12.text: Wake up, you useless hunk of junk, I'm being attacked!
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shouting to the steel watcherNodeContext: Panicked

31.speaker: Player
31.text: What if I were to pay for, say, a 'trading licence' first?
31.context: NodeContext: Slow to catch on, then playing along

45.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
45.text: A trading licence? Right, right. Yes, I could provide you with one of those, for the, uh, official fee. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
45.context: NodeContext: Slow to catch on, then playing along

42.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
42.text: A trading licence? Right, right. Yes, I could provide you with one of those, for the, uh, official fee. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
42.context: NodeContext: Slow to catch on, then playing along

62.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
62.text: Much appreciated. Take a look around.

29.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
29.text: Pleasure doing business with you. Now bugger off.

19.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
19.text: Pleasure doing business with you. Now bugger off.

21.speaker: Player
21.context: NodeContext: A bit flustered,she almost accepted a bribe and now wants the conversation done

0.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
0.text: Good. Clear off, then. I'm busy.
0.context: NodeContext: A bit flustered,she almost accepted a bribe and now wants the conversation done

69.text: Shhh. Quiet! That rust heap might be listening...
69.context: CinematicNodeContext: flinching, scaredNodeContext: quieter, trying not to be overheard (not whispered)

76.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
76.text: Shhh. Quiet! That rust heap might be listening...
76.context: CinematicNodeContext: flinching, scaredNodeContext: quieter, trying not to be overheard (not whispered)

46.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
46.text: Shhh. Quiet! Someone might be listening...

73.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
73.text: I'm not interested. Now get out. I've got work to do.

20.speaker: Player
20.text: Seek the cause of her sour mood.

58.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
58.text: Can't believe they put that mindless metal mragreshem in my armoury.

11.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
11.text: Can't believe they put that mindless metal mragreshem in my armoury.

60.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
60.text: 'Steel Watchers'. Stupid thing'll probably decapitate me for cleaning the bloody mace rack.

35.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
35.text: Won't be long before those Watchers are hulking around here again, nosin' in on my affairs.

43.text: Wake up, you brainless gimcrack! I'm being attacked!
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shouting to the steel watcherNodeContext: Panicked

49.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
49.text: Wake up, you brainless gimcrack! I'm being attacked!
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shouting to the steel watcherNodeContext: Panicked

40.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
40.text: Dammit, someone help me - this fool's messing in my mind!

63.speaker: Player
63.text: The better outfitted I am, the less work there is for you Fists inside the city.

36.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
36.text: A gith in my armoury? I don't think so. Clear off.

16.speaker: Player
16.text: Show me what you have to trade, istik.
16.context: NodeContext: Istik (ISS-tik) = stranger (catch-all term for non-gith)

51.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
51.text: Oi. I told you already - Flaming Fists only in here. Leave. Now.

33.speaker: Player
33.text: Just checking if that trading licence is still available?
33.context: NodeContext: a bit awkward, the 'fee' is a bribe

57.speaker: Arkleia Oloril
57.text: It is, but the er... fee isn't negotiable. Come back when you have the coin.
57.context: NodeContext: a bit awkward, the 'fee' is a bribe

25.speaker: Player
25.text: I'd like to buy the trading licence we discussed. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
